system.description: The characler's powers spring from them being a member of the subspecies Home superior. They have a latent X-Gene that grants them powers, often trigeered at adolescence.
system.examples: Cyclops, Jean Grey, Storm, Walvering (Lopan), Wolverine (Laura Kinney).
